statistics.resources: select ?resource (count(*) as ?frequency) where { [] a ?resource } group by ?resource order by desc(?frequency)
statistics.predicates: select ?predicate (count(*) as ?frequency) where { [] ?predicate ?obj . filter(isLiteral(?obj)) . } group by ?predicate order by desc(?frequency)

questions.question: Give me all movies by Denzel Washington
questions.query: select distinct ?movie where { ?movie a imdb:Movie . ?movie imdb:actor ?actor . ?actor imdb:name "Denzel Washington" . }

questions.question: Give me all spanish language work
questions.query: select distinct ?work where { ?work a imdb:Work . ?work imdb:language ?lang . ?lang rdfs:label "Spanish" . }
